description: This file defines a React functional component named DataTable, which renders a responsive data table with customizable columns, rows, styling, and messages.

methods.name: DataTable({ columns, rows, emptyMessage = "No data", variant = "default", headerClassName = "", tableClassName = "" })
methods.description: React functional component that renders a responsive table based on provided columns and rows, with optional styling and message.
parameters: columns (array): Array of column definitions including key, label, and optional render function.
rows (array): Array of data objects to populate the table.
emptyMessage (string): Message displayed when there are no rows.
headerClassName (string): Additional class name for header cells.
tableClassName (string): Additional class name for the table element.

ctags.name: DataTable
ctags.pattern: /^export function DataTable({ columns, rows, emptyMessage = "No data", variant = "default", header/
ctags.signature: ({ columns, rows, emptyMessage = "No data", variant = "default", headerClassName = "", tableClassName = "" })
